title: Omnimus
description:

    * Official support forum: <a href=" http://www.gsmcure.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?f=31" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.gsmcure.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?f=31</a>
    * Facebook fanpage: 




********************
 Omnius for Samsung
********************

Omnius for Samsung is a new generation service software for Samsung(R) phones.

It allows you to unlock network locks, change phone language packages, and
provides you with many advanced features.


-----------------
 Getting Started
-----------------

1. Get an Omnius account.

You need an Omnius account to be able to use Omnius to its full potential.
Visit http://www.omnius-server.com/ and follow "Registration" to create one
if you have not registered yet.

Note that if you already own a Supreme Credit account, you may simply
use it with Omnius.

With the account you will be able to access download area directly from
the site.


2. Install drivers.

When connecting the cable to a PC or to a phone for the first time,
the operating system will ask you for the corresponding device driver.
You can find drivers for all supported phones and cables in the "Drivers"
subfolder.


3. Configuring the application.

  - Run the Omnius for Samsung application
  - Click on the Language icon and choose your preferred language
  - Click on the Server tab, click on the Server Settings icon, and type
    in your username and password
  - Optionally you may define application folders or configure
    network proxies


4. Use the application.

  - Run the Omnius executable
  - Select a phone model from the phone model list
  - Click the desired operation icon
  - If prompted by the application, fill in all required items
  - Follow the application instructions
  - Enjoy!



The Omnius Team


Omnius website: http://www.omnius-server.com/
Official support forum: http://www.gsmcure.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?f=31
